title: Garden & Pool
shortDescription: Automated irrigation and pool management systems.
subtitle: Your Outdoor Oasis, Automated
introTitle: Extend your smart living experience to the outdoors.
introText: Create the perfect outdoor retreat with automated pool controls, landscape lighting, and weather-based irrigation. Whether you are hosting a summer party or relaxing by the fire pit, control it all from your phone.

featureSections.title: Pool & Spa Control
featureSections.description: Set water temperature, activate jets, and control lighting for your pool and spa, ensuring it is ready when you are.

featureSections.title: Landscape Lighting
featureSections.description: Enhance curb appeal and safety with automated path lights and spotlights that turn on at sunset.

featureSections.title: Smart Irrigation
featureSections.description: Save water and keep your lawn lush with sprinkler systems that adjust based on local weather forecasts.
